x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Nonprofits receive donor feedback via emails, surveys, or social platforms but rarely analyze the sentiment to improve donor relations.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

A Predictive Intelligence model that analyzes donor emails or comments for sentiment, categorizes them (positive, neutral, negative), and triggers workflows for follow-up.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

  • Predictive Intelligence
  • CSM
  • FSM
  • App Engine
  • Social Platform Integration

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Handling unstructured text and multilingual sentiment analysis.
